casebody.data:
[Cite as 04107/2003 Case Announcements #2, 2003-Ohio-1746.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

April 7, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-0549. State ex rel. Benbow v. Runyan.

Ashland App. No. 03COA008. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Ashland County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of April 7, 2003 contempt hearing and underlying contempt proceeding,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.
